description: brown mask with protruding forehead; gritted, jagged white teeth; wide nose; vertical red line on forehead; white lines and red and black seeds at temples; plant fiber ball attached to braided fibers hanging from chin; headdress of smaller plant fiber balls; woven fibers on back of head; brown, white, green and blue feathers at top
marks:
Inscription

behind PL temple, in white: [FC6115
medium: Wood, plant fibers, pigments, feathers, abrus seeds
title: Mask
